ee anuwa 2016 wana wita meratata paminena sancharakayin pramanaya miliyana 2.5 dakwa wardhanaya kirima, me kalaya thula apa ratata dolar miliyana 3000ka ruju widesha aayojana adaganima, me aashritha rakiya awastha 500,000k laba ganima, warshika widesha huwamaru ipayim amarikan dolar biliyana 2.75 k bawata path kirima, shri lankawa sancharaka wyaparaya sandaha lokaye aakarshaniya diwayina bawata path kirima, me kshethraye siyalu prathilabha samastha aarthikaya ha samajaya wetha gala yana paridi bedaharima me aramunu we.
dawasak mama dula dennata lassana mahum mostharayakin gawum dekak mahala dunna.
